english.segment1: if it wasn't for your mercy. if it wasn't for your love. if it wasnt for your kindness. how could i stand?. if it wasnt for your cleansing. if it wasnt for your blood. if it wasnt for your goodness. how could i stand?
english.segment2: yet i find myself again. where even angels fear to tread. where i would never dare to come. but for the cleansing of your blood
english.segment3: with you there is forgiveness. and therefore you are feared. Jesus its your loving kindness. that brings me to my knees
english.segment4: and i find myself again. where even angels fear to tread. where i would never dare to come. but for the cleansing of your blood
english.segment5: in the beauty of your holiness. here in the beauty of your holiness. x2
